Posts.Content: I can only go by what ive heard... but during rt pampering should be ok as long as you take care of the treated area... i.e. no chemicals, oils etc  xx
Posts.Title: This might be a silly question

Posts.Content: Hi Hotshots1967 Dont worry about the oncotype dx. The oncos just want to be certain that chemo is best way forward as its such a vicious drug. And just take it a day at a time and all will be well!  Be happy..xx
Posts.Title: Can’t stop worrying

Posts.Content: My oncotype dx result took about 2 weeks to come back... went to onco on 30th Nov and by 14th Dec results were back... not to sound like a saddist im glad i had a definitive result... mine was High... i didnt have to make a decision about whether i should push for chemo or not or if i need Chemo at all... Wishing you both the very best for the results... may it be your heart's desire.. Be happy xx
Posts.Title: Can’t stop worrying

Posts.Content: Hi Cannon please go.. and like others have said if only to put your mind at ease. I hope it goes well. The very best x
